title: NFL moves Vikings-Rams playoff tilt to Arizona
description: The NFL has moved Monday's playoff game between the Vikings and Rams to Arizona, saying the decision was made in the interest of public safety as wildfires continue to ravage Southern California.
author: ESPN

title: Hornets-Lakers ppd.; Redick's home lost in fires
description: The NBA postponed Thursday's game between the Hornets and Lakers because of the wildfires in the Los Angeles area that have claimed over 1,000 structures, including the home of Lakers coach JJ Redick.

title: 'Everton need stability' - how chaotic day unfolded
description: Everton sacked manager Sean Dyche just hours before their FA Cup win against Peterborough - this is how a chaotic day unfolded at Goodison Park.

title: Rebels issue demand for RFU chief Sweeney sacking
description: The crisis at the top of English rugby erupts as rebels call for a final confrontation over Rugby Football Union's embattled chief executive Bill Sweeney

title: Orange Bowl live updates: Notre Dame vs. Penn State opens CFP semifinals
description: Two proud programs that haven't won a national title since the 1980s clash in Miami for a spot in the CFP championship game. Follow it all here!
author: Yahoo Sports

title: NBA postpones Thursday's Hornets-Lakers game due to Los Angeles wildfires, coach JJ Redick's home reportedly lost
description: "The entire NBA family sends its thoughts and support to the community of Los Angeles during this challenging time," the league said.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Amad commits future to Man Utd with new deal until 2030
description: Amad Diallo has signed a new contract that will keep him at Manchester United until 2030.

title: Potter: Joining 'amazing' West Ham is like Christmas for adults!
description: Graham Potter has been confirmed as Julen Lopetegui's successor and has compared joining West Ham to "Christmas for adults" while explaining how excited he is to get started.
